name: Two Mountains
description: While painting this image I recived some bad news that my caousin had a brain tumor. In my frustration and sorrow I smeared the paint from the original image. As time passed and the paint dried there was more bad news. A large mass was found in his left lung. I returned to the painting an drew this on top going over some of the remaning image. Whenever adversity strikes I'm reminded of a quote from the bible when Jesus said, "Truly I tell you, if you have faith as small as a mustard seed, you can say to this mountain, ‘Move from here to there,’ and it will move. Nothing will be impossible for you.” Mathew 17:20 I'm not sure if I've ever been able to move the mountain in front of me but I have learned to fly grace fully over it. A lot of emotions went into this painting. What does it make you feel?
